segments.text: Would you like to order anything else ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I'm good . All we need now is our check .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The waitress is walking over here with our check even as we speak .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have never had bad service at this restaurant , but this time was really exceptional .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , she really went out of her way to make this a pleasant dining experience .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's take a look at our bill . The total price for our dinner is $ 36.00 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much money should we leave for a tip ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know that 15 % is a normal tip , but I really thought that this waitress went out of her way for us . What do you think about tipping her 20 % ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She definitely deserves 20 % for a tip .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So we can add her tip of $ 7.20 to the bill of $ 36.00 and the total will be $ 43.20 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It absolutely was a great meal . We'll have to return here for lunch sometime .
segments.speaker: S2
